title: Customer Payment & Revenue Insights Dashboard
description: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard analyzing customer payment patterns and revenue streams. Built with advanced DAX formulas and achieved 100% UAT success rate. Tracked ₹3,864,000 revenue with ₹813,500 identified at risk.
impact: Improved process clarity and boosted profitability through risk identification
keyFeatures: Advanced DAX calculations for revenue analysis
Comprehensive UAT framework with 100% success rate

title: E-Commerce Sales & Order Insights Dashboard
description: Comprehensive analysis of 128,000+ e-commerce orders identifying cancellation patterns and process optimization opportunities. Discovered 20% higher cancellation rate leading to improved efficiency.
impact: Identified process inefficiencies leading to 20% improvement in order completion
keyFeatures: Automated alert system for high cancellation rates

title: Crypto Market Risk & Sentiment Dashboard
description: Advanced cryptocurrency market analysis dashboard featuring volatility tracking, risk assessment, and sentiment analysis. Implemented custom KPIs including CAGR and volatility metrics, reducing manual work by 40%.
impact: Reduced manual analysis work by 40% and improved investment decision-making
